categories.title: Portraits
categories.description: Classic portrait-focused looks—from professional headshots to stylized camera aesthetics and profile angles.

subcategories.title: Professional Headshot
subcategories.description: Clean, modern headshot with flattering light, natural skin tone, and a confident, approachable expression.

subcategories.title: Business Portrait (Black Suit)
subcategories.description: Corporate portrait styling—formal wardrobe, crisp contrast, and a composed, leadership-leaning vibe.

subcategories.title: 1990s Camera Style Portrait
subcategories.description: 90s-inspired point-and-shoot look—direct flash, softer detail, and nostalgic color/contrast.

subcategories.title: Canon IXUS Aesthetic Portrait
subcategories.description: Compact-digital vibe—bright flash, punchy color, and that early-digital 'snapshot' character.

subcategories.title: Left Profile View
subcategories.description: Subject turned to show the left profile—useful for consistent angle studies and side-view composition.

subcategories.title: Right Profile View
subcategories.description: Subject turned to show the right profile—paired with left profile for symmetry and comparison.

categories.title: Selfies
categories.description: Casual, self-shot portrait styles with an authentic, personal feel (often mirror-based).

subcategories.title: Mirror Selfie (2000s Aesthetic)
subcategories.description: Y2K-era mirror selfie feel—flashy, casual framing, and playful early-2000s energy.

subcategories.title: Bathroom Mirror Selfie
subcategories.description: Informal bathroom mirror selfie—realistic lighting, tight spaces, candid styling.

categories.title: Fashion / Editorial
categories.description: High-fashion, magazine-inspired styling with polished lighting, posing, and set direction.

subcategories.title: Victoria's Secret–Style Shoot
subcategories.description: Lingerie/glam studio vibe—soft yet polished lighting, confident posing, glossy finish.

subcategories.title: Studio Vogue Editorial
subcategories.description: Editorial studio look—high-fashion posing, strong styling direction, and magazine-ready lighting.

categories.title: Film / Mood
categories.description: Emotional, cinematic treatments focused on atmosphere, grain, and color character.

subcategories.title: Emotional Film Photography
subcategories.description: Filmic mood—grain, softer highlights, and color treatment aimed at storytelling and feeling.

categories.title: Enhancements (AI Tools)
categories.description: Editing-focused utilities that improve or repair an image (not a 'style' category).

subcategories.title: Smart Crowd Removal
subcategories.description: Removes unwanted people/background clutter while keeping the scene looking natural.

subcategories.title: Upscaling
subcategories.description: Increases resolution and detail for sharper large-format exports while preserving natural textures.

subcategories.title: Restoration
subcategories.description: Repairs older or damaged images (scratches, noise, fading) while keeping a believable result.
